entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 5:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

Humidity: 86 %

Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: NNE 22 km/h gust 37 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
